modName: Throwing Knives WIP with skill - requires MTS
summary: This is a changed version of Throwing Knifes WIP that gives it its own skill using Merged Thievery Skill
descriptionHtml:
First of all this requires MTS http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21792 details later but putting this on the first line for everyone to read. The original Throwing Knives mod was an inspiration for MTS which exists in part because of it.

***Looking for:
Artist to create a background image for the perk tree. I think I want something looking like a knife with some traces behind suggesting it spins trough air that will fit over the perk tree (this may also be rearranged a little to overlap better)
Description:
This gives the throwing knifes it\'s own skill and perk tree and relays on MTS (get it from the link on the first line) for Lockpick and Pickpocket skill in order to free up a skill slot (CK doesn\'t allow adding custom skills)

Perks (see picture) they are still subject to change/tune numbers:
First of all you should manually remove via console perks from Pickpocket and Lockpick that were removed in the Thievery skill, then you should add the same number also via console...preferably in Throwing skill. Type \'help \"skill name\"\' then \'player.removeskill XXX\' and \'player.addskill XXX\' where XXX is the id returned bt the \'help\' command. Sorry but CK provides no way to increase the available perk points.
Sharp Knives 5 levels: +20% damage increase, usual weapon perk stuff
Point Blank: you don\'t loose your knife if target is in close range
Trusted Knife 2 levels: increase the chance to recover knifes from victims body
Strong Arm: chance to knock down target on hit
Quick Arm 2 levels: Throws 2 then 3 weapons at once
Weak Spot: ignores armor
Cripple: chance to drain stamina
Instant Kill: chance for instant kill
(Deadly Aim from sneak influences sneaking damage)

Load order, install and compatibility:
Use either this or original Throwing Weapons, they use same IDs.
Load this after Merged Thievery Skill. Incompatible with mods that MTS is incompatible with.
You should remove via console perks that I removed from Lockpick and Pickpoket and that are not found in Thievery skill, then add the same number of perks also via console, preferably to Throwing skill.

Future development:
Bug fixing, perks and via scripting and other things that require CK only.
Don\'t hope for additional weapons or animations as I\'m not into that and have no time to learn. If original creator of Throwing Weapons will decide to help with this then maybe.

Credits:
This is an edited version of Throwing Knives WIP http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11875 giving throwing knifes it\'s own skill and perk tree. I contacted raden5 (Nez on steam) and he agreed with the publishing of this. Did I mention that you should NOT use both this and the original?
author: Original creator of Throwing Knifes and LukeH
